page.title: 11A DAY IN THE LIFE OF JAMES
page.content: The first thing I do when I wake up is get dressed and go downstairs. I go outside with Dad and let Dan our dog loose. We move the cows outside and then we go and look at the bullocks. I look at the kittens and then have a look at the cow and calf. Then I feed them. I have some breakfast and play a game of snooker. Then I get ready and set off for school. When I come back at quarter to four I play with Peter. We pretend to shoot at cars as they go past. After Peter's Dad comes to collect him Dad and I go to move the cows.
